## hardwrap() function

Hard-wrap a string to the specified width.

Wraps text at exact character boundaries, breaking words if necessary. This is the recommended function for strict width enforcement.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function hardwrap(s: string, limit: number, options?: HardWrapOptions): string;
```

**Returns:**

string

The wrapped string

## Example


```ts
const wrapped = hardwrap("HelloWorld", 4);
// "Hell\noWor\nld"
```
